creator: mgainty@hotmail.com
text:
I have noted that under Windows 2000 that when exec runs that a 
True Dos Environment is not sucessfully created for the executing task.
Your program will run but I/O will be unsuccessful.
The same holds for using apply
Is there a workaround to making exec or apply work to create a TRUE
DOS Environment?

creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text:
Could you be more specific and explain what you are calling a true DOS environment ? Maybe attach a 
short example showing what you think is missing ?

this is my interpretation of what you mean with "true DOS environment".  Please
reopen if I'm wrong.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 2738 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
